experience.title: Warehouse and Logistics Manager
experience.location: Sohar, Al Batinah North Governorate, Oman
experience.description: ♛Achievements:	Achieved seamless warehouse operations, excelling in inventory control, purchasing, and overall management.	Supervised the efficient flow of goods, ensuring the prompt and accurate handling of receiving and dispatching orders.	Successfully managed reverse logistics, imports, and exports, adeptly navigating the complexities of international shipping, maintaining compliance, and minimising delays.	Conducted routine stock takes and implemented robust inventory control measures, resulting in streamlined inventory management and minimized discrepancies.	Collaborated closely with local and regional couriers to coordinate sales orders, ensuring timely deliveries and exceptional customer satisfaction.	Leveraged 22 years of experience to implement cost-effective logistics strategies, reducing operational costs and enhancing overall efficiency.	Collaborated effectively with the procurement team to optimise overall supply chain performance, ensuring the availability of materials while minimising costs.	Successfully implemented and executed cost-effective logistics solutions, aligning operations with strategic objectives.	Fostered productive external relationships with shipping companies, brokers, transport authorities, customs, and customers, ensuring the smooth coordination of product shipments.	Managed inventory accuracy across warehouse and manufacturing locations, maintaining precise material master information within the WMS system.	Utilised analytical skills to make data-driven decisions that enhanced the customer-centric approach within the organisation, resulting in improved customer satisfaction and retention.	Managed and supervised the maintenance and repair of critical warehouse equipment, including forklifts, pallet jacks, and conveyor systems, to guarantee their optimal performance and reduce operational disruptions.
experience.description_html: ♛Achievements: Achieved seamless warehouse operations, excelling in inventory control, purchasing, and overall management. Supervised the efficient flow of goods, ensuring the prompt and accurate handling of receiving and dispatching orders. Successfully managed reverse logistics, imports, and exports, adeptly navigating the complexities of international shipping, maintaining compliance, and minimising delays. Conducted routine stock takes and implemented robust inventory control measures, resulting in streamlined inventory management and minimized discrepancies. Collaborated closely with local and regional couriers to coordinate sales orders, ensuring timely deliveries and exceptional customer satisfaction. Leveraged 22 years of experience to implement cost-effective logistics strategies, reducing operational costs and enhancing overall efficiency. Collaborated effectively with the procurement team to optimise overall supply chain performance, ensuring the availability of materials while minimising costs. Successfully implemented and executed cost-effective logistics solutions, aligning operations with strategic objectives. Fostered productive external relationships with shipping companies, brokers, transport authorities, customs, and customers, ensuring the smooth coordination of product shipments. Managed inventory accuracy across warehouse and manufacturing locations, maintaining precise material master information within the WMS system. Utilised analytical skills to make data-driven decisions that enhanced the customer-centric approach within the organisation, resulting in improved customer satisfaction and retention. Managed and supervised the maintenance and repair of critical warehouse equipment, including forklifts, pallet jacks, and conveyor systems, to guarantee their optimal performance and reduce operational disruptions.

experience.title: Warehouse Manager
experience.location: Umm Al Quwain, Umm al-Quwain, United Arab Emirates
experience.description: ♛Achievements:	Spearheaded inventory management, implementing efficient control systems, conducting routine stock checks, and optimizing storage, resulting in maximized space utilization and minimal waste.	Orchestrated seamless collaboration with suppliers, logistics providers, and internal departments, ensuring the punctual and precise delivery of products, efficient inbound and outbound shipments, and meticulously managed transportation schedules.	Achieved impeccable compliance with health and safety regulations, cultivating a clean and organized warehouse environment, delivering safety training to staff, and proactively identifying and mitigating potential hazards.	Managed the maintenance and repair of critical warehouse equipment, including forklifts, pallet jacks, and conveyor systems, ensuring their optimal functioning and minimizing operational downtime.	Successfully introduced and integrated a Warehouse Management System (WMS), resulting in heightened inventory accuracy, mitigated costly stockouts and overstock situations, and averted shipping errors to customers.	Diligently monitored key performance indicators (KPIs), conducted in-depth analysis of warehouse data, and generated regular reports covering inventory levels, productivity, operational efficiency, and other critical metrics. 	Conducted extensive research to identify and address shipping errors and packaging mistakes, demonstrating astute problem-solving capabilities.	Effectively categorized and redirected received cargo to align with customer requests, showcasing a customer-centric focus and meticulous cargo management.	Divided and categorised cargo received and redirected shipments in response to customer requests.	Supervised and motivated warehouse staff in a high-paced environment, maintaining efficiency and productivity levels.
experience.description_html: ♛Achievements: Spearheaded inventory management, implementing efficient control systems, conducting routine stock checks, and optimizing storage, resulting in maximized space utilization and minimal waste. Orchestrated seamless collaboration with suppliers, logistics providers, and internal departments, ensuring the punctual and precise delivery of products, efficient inbound and outbound shipments, and meticulously managed transportation schedules. Achieved impeccable compliance with health and safety regulations, cultivating a clean and organized warehouse environment, delivering safety training to staff, and proactively identifying and mitigating potential hazards. Managed the maintenance and repair of critical warehouse equipment, including forklifts, pallet jacks, and conveyor systems, ensuring their optimal functioning and minimizing operational downtime. Successfully introduced and integrated a Warehouse Management System (WMS), resulting in heightened inventory accuracy, mitigated costly stockouts and overstock situations, and averted shipping errors to customers. Diligently monitored key performance indicators (KPIs), conducted in-depth analysis of warehouse data, and generated regular reports covering inventory levels, productivity, operational efficiency, and other critical metrics.  Conducted extensive research to identify and address shipping errors and packaging mistakes, demonstrating astute problem-solving capabilities. Effectively categorized and redirected received cargo to align with customer requests, showcasing a customer-centric focus and meticulous cargo management. Divided and categorised cargo received and redirected shipments in response to customer requests. Supervised and motivated warehouse staff in a high-paced environment, maintaining efficiency and productivity levels.

experience.title: Warehouse Manager & Pallet Controller
experience.location: Ras Al Khaimah, Ras al-Khaimah, United Arab Emirates
experience.description: ♛Achievements:	Spearheaded comprehensive warehouse operations, overseeing product receipt, storage, and shipment to ensure remarkable efficiency and precision.	Orchestrated a high-performing warehouse team, with hands-on leadership encompassing recruitment, training, and performance assessments, resulting in a motivated and skilled workforce.	Pioneered continuous process improvement initiatives by implementing best practices and streamlining workflows, significantly boosting overall productivity.	Championed a safe work environment by rigorously enforcing safety protocols, conducting regular inspections, and achieving full OH&S compliance.	Spearheaded the effective maintenance and repair of vital warehouse equipment, including forklifts, pallet jacks, and conveyor systems, resulting in seamless operations and minimal downtime.	Collaborated seamlessly with customer service teams, guaranteeing punctual and precise order fulfillment, thus achieving outstanding customer satisfaction.	Harnessed the power of Warehouse Management Systems (WMS) and advanced technology tools to enhance warehouse efficiency and accuracy.	Successfully negotiated contracts with pallet suppliers, securing favourable terms that significantly reduced pallet-related costs while maintaining quality standards.	Maintained compliance with pallet-related regulations and industry standards, ensuring smooth operations and minimizing legal or regulatory risks.	Utilised advanced data analysis techniques to generate insightful reports on pallet usage, costs, and performance, facilitating informed decisions and substantial cost savings.	Fostered productive relationships with pallet suppliers and logistics partners, streamlining pallet supply chains and optimizing pallet availability.	Adopted effective communication with warehouse management, logistics teams, and suppliers, ensuring the smooth coordination of pallet-related activities and strategies.
experience.description_html: ♛Achievements: Spearheaded comprehensive warehouse operations, overseeing product receipt, storage, and shipment to ensure remarkable efficiency and precision. Orchestrated a high-performing warehouse team, with hands-on leadership encompassing recruitment, training, and performance assessments, resulting in a motivated and skilled workforce. Pioneered continuous process improvement initiatives by implementing best practices and streamlining workflows, significantly boosting overall productivity. Championed a safe work environment by rigorously enforcing safety protocols, conducting regular inspections, and achieving full OH&S compliance. Spearheaded the effective maintenance and repair of vital warehouse equipment, including forklifts, pallet jacks, and conveyor systems, resulting in seamless operations and minimal downtime. Collaborated seamlessly with customer service teams, guaranteeing punctual and precise order fulfillment, thus achieving outstanding customer satisfaction. Harnessed the power of Warehouse Management Systems (WMS) and advanced technology tools to enhance warehouse efficiency and accuracy. Successfully negotiated contracts with pallet suppliers, securing favourable terms that significantly reduced pallet-related costs while maintaining quality standards. Maintained compliance with pallet-related regulations and industry standards, ensuring smooth operations and minimizing legal or regulatory risks. Utilised advanced data analysis techniques to generate insightful reports on pallet usage, costs, and performance, facilitating informed decisions and substantial cost savings. Fostered productive relationships with pallet suppliers and logistics partners, streamlining pallet supply chains and optimizing pallet availability. Adopted effective communication with warehouse management, logistics teams, and suppliers, ensuring the smooth coordination of pallet-related activities and strategies.

experience.title: Warehouse / Purchase Officer
experience.description: ♛Achievements:	Controlled purchasing department's budgets and contribution to the company saving plans	Identified areas for procurement improvement to continually drive performance and business results	Used "Ariba" to prepare and deliver periodic business reviews covering aspects of fulfillment, availability, and item quality performance metrics	Analysed market and delivery systems to access present and future material availability	Prepared reports regarding market conditions and merchandise costs	Developed & implemented purchase and, contract management instructions, policies, and procedures	Fostered vendor relations and management processes by identifying and maintaining direct contact with suppliers	Worked on ERP Purchase Application, created Supplier, Purchase Order & checking stock position through the ERP Syteline System	Negotiated the company's contracts and delivery schedules with suppliers	Strategised and implemented methods for keeping material costs low and saving on the related delivery charges	Managed the disposal of surplus materials to recoup costs and minimise losses.
experience.description_html: ♛Achievements: Controlled purchasing department's budgets and contribution to the company saving plans Identified areas for procurement improvement to continually drive performance and business results Used "Ariba" to prepare and deliver periodic business reviews covering aspects of fulfillment, availability, and item quality performance metrics Analysed market and delivery systems to access present and future material availability Prepared reports regarding market conditions and merchandise costs Developed & implemented purchase and, contract management instructions, policies, and procedures Fostered vendor relations and management processes by identifying and maintaining direct contact with suppliers Worked on ERP Purchase Application, created Supplier, Purchase Order & checking stock position through the ERP Syteline System Negotiated the company's contracts and delivery schedules with suppliers Strategised and implemented methods for keeping material costs low and saving on the related delivery charges Managed the disposal of surplus materials to recoup costs and minimise losses.

experience.title: Purchase / Logistic Officer
experience.description: ♛Achievements:	Participated in the development of specifications for equipment, products/substitute materials	Utilised existing contracts/credit facilities in the procurement of materials and services	Reviewed purchase order claims and contracts in conformance with the company policy	Followed the workflow process, approval of purchase order, entering the new supplier & generating product codes in the ERP Oracle system	Established preferred suppliers for categories and implemented programs to develop, improve and manage supply base performance	Authored contract documents in line with budget control strategies, fair Pricing knowledge, and strategic management practices	Communicated, managed, and drove compliance to category strategies with excellent management and forecasting abilities	Identified dead inventory and created solutions for excess liquidation through aggressive and creative inventory management.	Identified and executed cost-reduction projects with good planning abilities and expert knowledge of business trends	Led efforts to reduce transaction volume and improve purchasing efficiency	Created sourcing strategies for specific categories to improve prices, delivery times, and risk categories	Resolved vendor or contractor grievances and claims against suppliers	Reviewed purchase order claims and contracts for compliance with company policy	Sourced and vetted new vendors to fulfilled the organisation's supply needs with quality materials.
experience.description_html: ♛Achievements: Participated in the development of specifications for equipment, products/substitute materials Utilised existing contracts/credit facilities in the procurement of materials and services Reviewed purchase order claims and contracts in conformance with the company policy Followed the workflow process, approval of purchase order, entering the new supplier & generating product codes in the ERP Oracle system Established preferred suppliers for categories and implemented programs to develop, improve and manage supply base performance Authored contract documents in line with budget control strategies, fair Pricing knowledge, and strategic management practices Communicated, managed, and drove compliance to category strategies with excellent management and forecasting abilities Identified dead inventory and created solutions for excess liquidation through aggressive and creative inventory management. Identified and executed cost-reduction projects with good planning abilities and expert knowledge of business trends Led efforts to reduce transaction volume and improve purchasing efficiency Created sourcing strategies for specific categories to improve prices, delivery times, and risk categories Resolved vendor or contractor grievances and claims against suppliers Reviewed purchase order claims and contracts for compliance with company policy Sourced and vetted new vendors to fulfilled the organisation's supply needs with quality materials.

experience.title: Purchase Officer.
experience.description: ♛Achievements:	Dealt with local and international suppliers and handled correspondences.	Negotiated terms of payment depending on the conversion cycle of production & marketing.	Liaise with the Finance Department for Letters of Credit.	Created sourcing strategies for specific categories to improve prices, delivery times, records, and risk categories.	Kept the department efficient and maintained documentation, effective purchasing policies, and positive vendor relations.	Monitored the shipments to verify the on-time arrival of goods and proactively resolve delivery problems.	Determined the reasonable price for each good or service by analysing all available data.	Maintained detailed records of routinely purchased items and specialty goods needed by different departments.
experience.description_html: ♛Achievements: Dealt with local and international suppliers and handled correspondences. Negotiated terms of payment depending on the conversion cycle of production & marketing. Liaise with the Finance Department for Letters of Credit. Created sourcing strategies for specific categories to improve prices, delivery times, records, and risk categories. Kept the department efficient and maintained documentation, effective purchasing policies, and positive vendor relations. Monitored the shipments to verify the on-time arrival of goods and proactively resolve delivery problems. Determined the reasonable price for each good or service by analysing all available data. Maintained detailed records of routinely purchased items and specialty goods needed by different departments.

experience.title: Material Supervisor.
experience.description: ♛Achievements:	Inspected completed products to verify quality and identify production problems.	Reviewed daily inventory activity and maintain inventory file with material description.	Maintained receiving records on file until the invoice is received, Reconcile invoices with correct receiving records, then forward both along with GRN to accounts.	Received warehouse copy of work orders which mentioned material requirement from planner after review with Material Manager issue the same to production.	Maintained MSDS and COA files.	Stacked and labelled raw materials using forklifts and labelling machines.	Reported safety issues to prevent accidents and avoid unnecessary delays.
experience.description_html: ♛Achievements: Inspected completed products to verify quality and identify production problems. Reviewed daily inventory activity and maintain inventory file with material description. Maintained receiving records on file until the invoice is received, Reconcile invoices with correct receiving records, then forward both along with GRN to accounts. Received warehouse copy of work orders which mentioned material requirement from planner after review with Material Manager issue the same to production. Maintained MSDS and COA files. Stacked and labelled raw materials using forklifts and labelling machines. Reported safety issues to prevent accidents and avoid unnecessary delays.

certifications.title: TLILIC0003 Licence to operate a forklift truck

certifications.subtitle: Australian Skills Quality Authority (ASQA)
